argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_absval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` A ) = ( sqrt ` ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cjmulrcl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cjmulge0 | |- ( A e. CC -> 0 <_ ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_resqrtcl | |- ( ( ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) e. RR /\ 0 <_ ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) -> ( sqrt ` ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sqrt ` ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) e. RR ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` A ) e. RR ) |
